conbody.p: head countThe teacher may want to perform student head count before the class has started. Select ClassHead count _fixme_ [ui] from the main menu to initiate student registration.
conbody.note: Performing the head count registration resets assignment of students to groups as all registered students are automatically assigned to group A. It is therefore advantageous to perform a head count at the beginning of the class.
conbody.p: Students must press Call button on their modules to perform the registration.
Select ClassHead count again to finish the head count registration.
conbody.note: Use the student menu (see ) to manually change registration status of individual students.
